subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks tried their best to shoot in seven seconds or less in their first exhibition game this season, with the result being a sometimes-entertaining, often-sloppy loss to the Toronto Raptors.
snippet: The Knicks tried their best to shoot in seven seconds or less in their first exhibition game this season, with the result being a sometimes-entertaining, often-sloppy loss to the Toronto Raptors.
